name: Penguin Flip
description:
You're a penguin. You're a bit lost. Find your way home in this exciting adventure!

Controls

  • WASD or left stick to move
  • Spacebar or Y button to hop
  • Press A or left-click on the title menu to start the game

Assets

This game uses free/CC0 assets from the following sources:

  • Penguin sounds: https://www.freesoundslibrary.com/penguin-noise/
  • Africa background: https://pixabay.com/photos/africa-kilimanjaro-kenya-nature-4278141/
  • Water background: https://pixabay.com/photos/wave-ocean-sea-storm-tsunami-1913559/
  • Antarctica background: https://pixabay.com/photos/antarctica-ice-glaciers-snow-2680626/
